trustfund:
TF022332-PHRD-EMERGENCY REHABILITATION PROJECT,TF031568-CAMBODIA - EMERGENCY
            REHABILITATION PROJECT,TF025995-EMERGENCY REHABILITATION PROJECT,TF032939-CAMBODIA - PHNOM PENH POWER REHAB,TF032938-CAMBODIA - PHNOM PENH POWER REHAB

abstracts.cdata!:
Cambodia is now able to devote its
            resources to development with the implmentation of the Paris
            Accords. Cambodia's physical capital has run down and
            its human resources have been depleted because of
            insufficient resources to generate productive income. A
            foundation for a new pattern of development in private hands
            is being esablished. Private activities took the lead in
            fostering economic growth. The Emergency Rehabilitation
            Project for Cambodia will support the implmentation of
            critical activities to help restore and maintain capacity
            utilization and production in key sectors. The project will
            provide critical imports for specific rehabilitation
            activities in the transport, agriculture, health, education,
            power and water supply sectors; and commodities essential
            for the Cambodian economy to underake economic recovery. The
            chosen sectors cover areas not receiving external financing
            from other sources.
